item.title: IAI Research Group at CASE2024
item.description:
We are excited that the IAI Research Group will attend the 20th International Conference on Automation Science and Engineering (CASE) in Bari, Italy on 28th August - 1st September, 2024

We will present our three accepted papers:

  • Dazzle Johnson - “Multi-Agent Scheduler for the Continuous Dynamic Flexible Job Shop Scheduling Problem”
  • Regina Lee - “Split-Hand Assembly Action Recognition Enhanced with Knowledge-Driven Sequence Reasoning”
  • Huachang (Benedict) Liang - “Context-Aware Cognitive Assembly Assistive System Based on Online Human Action Recognition”

Dr. Yuqian Lu will also be demonstrating the Assembly Assistive System during the Workshops held on 1st September.

For more information, visit the CASE 2024 Website

item.title: Visit from Professor Olga Battaïa
item.description:
Professor Olga Battaïa, Associate Dean for Research at the Operations Management and Information Systems Department, KEDGE Business School, France, visited our team on November 28, 2022.

In-depth discussion was held between two parties under MSCA-RISE-2019: Marie Sklodowska-Curie Research and Innovation Staff Exchange (RISE): “MODELS AND METHODS FOR AN ACTIVE AGEING WORKFORCE: AN INTERNATIONAL ACADEMY”.

item.title: We are hosting 2023 IEEE CASE Conference in Auckland
item.description:
“Automation for a Resilient Society”

We are excited that the 19th International Conference on Automation Science and Engineering (CASE) will be hosted in Auckland, New Zealand on 26th August - 29th August, 2023. The upcoming conference theme is “Automation for a Resilient Society”.

IEEE CASE 2023 will be held in Auckland, giving attendees a chance to learn about Aotearoa New Zealand’s cutting-edge innovations and automation in the fields of manufacturing, agriculture, aquaculture, forestry, infrastructure, and healthcare.

As the Organising Committee Chair, Dr. Yuqian Lu is committed to making IEEE CASE 2023 and unforgettable experience.

For more information, visit the CASE 2023 Website
